Druddigon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0620: Mienshao
Pokémon
#0622: Golett →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Druddigon (TCG Pocket).

Druddigon has been featured on 13 different cards since it debuted as one of the BW-P Promotional cards of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Druddigon cards are normally Dragon-type Basic Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks normally have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Druddigon

Druddigon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Druddigon         BW-P Promotional cards   026/BW-P
Druddigon Noble Victories 89/101 Red Collection 059/066
Legendary Treasures 106/113 EX Battle Boost   090/093
Druddigon Dragon Vault   17/20 Dragon Selection   017/020
Druddigon Plasma Storm 94/135 Plasma Gale 050/070
Druddigon BW Black Star Promos   BW80 BW-P Promotional cards   201/BW-P
Druddigon Plasma Blast 70/101 Megalo Cannon 058/076
Druddigon Flashfire 70/106 Wild Blaze 056/080
Druddigon Steam Siege 83/114 Fever-Burst Fighter 043/054
Druddigon Dragon Majesty 45/70 Dragon Storm 032/053
Druddigon Unified Minds 157/236 Sky Legend 033/054
Druddigon Brilliant Stars 113/172 VMAX Climax   121/184
Silver Tempest TG09/TG30 VMAX Climax 209/184
Druddigon Journey Together 115/159 Battle Partners 073/100
Druddigon White Flare 071/086 White Flare 069/086
White Flare 151/086 White Flare 150/086
